verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: When] [ARG0: we] [V: worry] and wonder about authoritarian regimes that inflict cruelty on civilians , we often imagine tyrannical despots unilaterally advancing their sinister agendas . But no would - be autocrat can act alone . As a practical matter , he needs subordinates willing to carry out orders . Of course , neither Donald Trump nor Steve Bannon personally detained any of the more than 100 people held at airports over the weekend pursuant to the administration 's executive order on immigration , visitation and
